question: According to its nutritional info, a bag of breads has 200 calories per serving. If a 100 grams bag has 5 servings, how many gramss can you eat if your daily calorie target is 2450 and you have already consumed 1650 calories?
answer:
If the total calorie target is 2450 and I have consumed 1650 calories then I have 2450-1650 = <<2450-1650=800>>800 calories left to eat
If each serving of breads has 200 calories and I only have 800 calories left to eat, then I can only eat 800/200 of a serving = 4 of a serving
We also know that a 100 grams bag of breads has 5 servings, hence each serving has 100 grams/5 = <<100/5=20>>20 gramss
If I can only eat 4 of a serving, then I can eat only 20 grams * 4 = 80 gramss
#### 80
